entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (5)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (5)20140209
I played the coin battle mode with my son for about thirty
minutes. I like that they appear to be unique levels.

Then we played for another hour and did the first half of the
Sparking Waters World. My wife really doesn't like water levels
because she finds it too hard to control.

Total time: 4:46
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers U
  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: Punch Quest (iOS, 2012)
entry.content:
Game: Punch Quest (iOS, 2012)20140209
I downloaded this and did a round. It was pretty fun and the
controls were not horrific. It does have the sense of "what is
going on here?" while things are just happening to you.

Total time: 0:03

  • iOS

entry.title: Game: Wizorb (Steam, 2012) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Wizorb (Steam, 2012) (6)20140209
I played for about fifteen minutes and got to 4-5 again. Then I
played for another three hours and never made any progress. There
were quite a few times were I was a single brick away from beating
the level. It is so brutal and demoralizing, I don't think I can
do it anymore.

Total time: 7:39
  • Video Games
  • Wizorb
  • Steam
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: Flappy Bird (iOS, 2013)
entry.content:
Game: Flappy Bird (iOS, 2013)20140208
I played this for about two minutes and was only able to get
through 2 pipes. The game is definitely a satisfying experience,
despite its rough edges. I'd like to play it with a controller
though.

Total time: 0:02

  • Flappy Bird
  • iOS
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Jamestown: Legend of the Lost Colony (Steam, 2011) (6)
entry.content:
Game: Jamestown: Legend of the Lost Colony (Steam, 2011) (6)20140208
I played for forty-five minutes today and beat it. On the time
that I won, I got to the final battle with 2 Credits and no Extra
Lives. I decided to get off the treadmill to do it and that seemed
to be a wise decision, because I could focus more and was closer.

This was a fun game! I don't think the scoring system is as good
as a CAVE game, but definitely it was a lot of fun.

Total time: 3:27
  • Video Games
  • Jamestown: Legend of the Lost Colony
  • Steam
  • 2011

version?

entry.title: Game: Wizorb (Steam, 2012) (3)
entry.content:
Game: Wizorb (Steam, 2012) (3)20140206
I played for an hour and fifteen-ish and beat the second World. I
discovered an exploit where if you Save & Quit when you die, your
progress in a World is saved even though it says it won't be. This
made it a lot easier to play through the World because I was able
to beat one level at a time. Of course, you don't get back Lives,
Continues, or Magic, so you're basically beating each level with
no abilities.

Total time: 2:56
  • Video Games
  • Wizorb
  • Steam
  • 2012

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 1 - Episode 12 - Prophecy Girl
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 1 - Episode 12 - Prophecy Girl20140205
This was a great episode that is a great climax. I think that
Buffy's dress looks great and reminds me of the end of the
movie. I like how brave she is and how she gets stronger after
coming back. It's also nice that Cordelia is so involved with the
ending and it fits.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (14)
entry.content:
Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (14)20140202
I played today four about an hour and did a championship. My baby
daughter pulled out the cord of the wheel on the final turn of a
race when I was in first with 8 seconds to spare. Unfortunately,
the game doesn't press Pause automatically when the controller
turns off. By the time I plugged it in and got back, I made it to
the end in third. Bummer. I did it again and won though after the
championship was done.

International B - 25% - 45 - 171 - 19 - 126 - 59 - $1.114mil

Total time: 21:31
  • Video Games
  • Gran Turismo 6
  • PS3
  • 2013
